paper_abstract: A generic programmable spike-timing based circuit which forms the building block of a reconfigurable neuromorphic array is implemented in analog VLSI. An array of programmable spike time event coded circuit blocks is configured to implement functional circuit blocks of a spike time based neuromorphic model. A reconfigurable neuromorphic array chip with 10 event blocks is fabricated using Austria Microsystems 0.35 mu m CMOS technology to demonstrate the functionality of the circuits in silicon. paper_title: A programmable spike-timing based circuit block for reconfigurable neuromorphic computing
